mapper.sql: id, did, bid, price, count, total, ordertime, posttime, paystatus, amountpaid, status, outid
mapper.select: select t.*, bx.id as bxid,bx.name as bxname, de.id as deid,de.name as dename, u.id as uid,u.name as uname from dealer_sales t left outer join productboxinfo bx on t.bid=bx.id left outer join dealerinfo de on t.did=de.id left outer join unit u on bx.gu = u.id where t.id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select t.*, bx.id as bxid,bx.name as bxname, de.id as deid,de.name as dename, u.id as uid,u.name as uname from dealer_sales t left outer join productboxinfo bx on t.bid=bx.id left outer join dealerinfo de on t.did=de.id left outer join unit u on bx.gu = u.id where t.status=0 and de.name like "%"#{key,jdbcType=VARCHAR}"%" order by t.posttime desc
limit ${pageable.offset}, ${pageable.pageSize}

select t.*, bx.id as bxid,bx.name as bxname, de.id as deid,de.name as dename, u.id as uid,u.name as uname from dealer_sales t left outer join productboxinfo bx on t.bid=bx.id left outer join dealerinfo de on t.did=de.id left outer join unit u on bx.gu = u.id where t.status=0 order by t.posttime desc
limit ${offset}, ${pageSize}

select t.*, bx.id as bxid,bx.name as bxname, de.id as deid,de.name as dename, u.id as uid,u.name as uname from dealer_sales t left outer join productboxinfo bx on t.bid=bx.id left outer join dealerinfo de on t.did=de.id left outer join unit u on bx.gu = u.id where t.outid = #{outid,jdbcType=INTEGER} and t.status=0
select count(*) from dealer_sales t left outer join dealerinfo de on t.did=de.id where de.name like "%"#{key,jdbcType=VARCHAR}"%" and t.status=0
select count(*) from dealer_sales where status=0

mapper.update:
update dealer_sales
did = #{dealer.id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
bid = #{box.id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
price = #{price,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
count = #{count,jdbcType=INTEGER},
total = #{total,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
ordertime = #{ordertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
posttime = #{posttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
paystatus = #{paystatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
amountpaid = #{amountpaid,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
outid = #{outid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update dealer_sales set did = #{dealer.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, bid = #{box.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, price = #{price,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, count = #{count,jdbcType=INTEGER}, total = #{total,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, ordertime = #{ordertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, posttime = #{posttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, paystatus = #{paystatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, amountpaid = #{amountpaid,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, outid = #{outid,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
